TopicTitle: KSP/Alpha/Cutoff shader is partially broken or used in unintended way

Articles.Content:
KSP 1.0.4

Windows 8

The thumbnail of the chair part is missing from a couple of places:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/rshxh6961t4rrzr/seat_VAB.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/rshxh6961t4rrzr/seat_VAB.png?dl=0)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/5qrmbkeat82dmmx/seat_RnD.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/5qrmbkeat82dmmx/seat_RnD.png?dl=0)

Also: the thumbnail of the launch clamp misses the vertical girder:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/ddnuu8xz4f4sl62/Clamp_VAB.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ddnuu8xz4f4sl62/Clamp_VAB.png?dl=0)

This was reported a couple of times (e.g.: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121440](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121440)), but didn't get any response.

Through trial and error I nailed this down: the shader you are using in this parts doesn't work properly with transparent background.

Here is my mod that fixes this problem:

CAUTION: this mod is untested, it might cause unexpected problems. Post bug reports here: [https://github.com/mongoose11235813/CommandSeatIconFix/issues](https://github.com/mongoose11235813/CommandSeatIconFix/issues)

Download: [https://github.com/mongoose11235813/CommandSeatIconFix/releases/tag/0.1](https://github.com/mongoose11235813/CommandSeatIconFix/releases/tag/0.1)

What is does:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/lfs4lh9uhio2god/seat_VAB.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/lfs4lh9uhio2god/seat_VAB.png?dl=0)

Hi Mongoose, thanks for looking into this, you may be interested in knowing that the whole UI is being remade in Unity 5, also there is a public bug tracker [**\[here\]**](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/projects/ksp/issues) which is a better place to put issues such as this one.

Hopefully the new UI will fix these alpha issues, if not then your fix may help.

Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
